normalised: Hello, my desi gossip gang! Grab your samosas and chai, because we're diving headfirst into the week's spiciest Bollywood buzz. The rumor mill is churning faster than my aunties during Diwali cleaning!

unnormalised: Hello, my desi gossip gang! Grab your samosas and chai, because we're diving headfirst into the week's spiciest Bollywood buzz. The rumor mill is churning faster than my aunties during Diwali cleaning!
normalised: First up, are Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt expecting baby number two? Sources (read: random Twitter accounts) are saying Alia was spotted looking a bit *different* at Ambani's bash. Could it be true? Guess we'll have to wait and watch. Remember how they surprised everyone with Raha?

normalised: Then there's the whole Deepika Padukone-Ranveer Singh drama. Are they or aren't they? The internet is going wild after Deepika unfollowed (then refollowed?) Ranveer's mother on Instagram. Maybe just a harmless Insta-glitch, or maybe…trouble in paradise? Praying to Ganesh Ji it's just a misunderstanding!

normalised: Speaking of paradise, Kiara Advani and Sidharth Malhotra were spotted holidaying in the Maldives *again*. Some are saying it was a second honeymoon, others think it’s just good old R and R after their movie promotions. Lucky them! Maldives seems to be Bollywood's favourite getaway, costing like fifty thousand rupees per night.

normalised: And hold on to your hats! Apparently, Karan Johar is planning a massive Dharma Productions party for his fifty second birthday, and the guest list is rumored to include everyone from S R K to Katrina Kaif. Will exes cross paths? Will there be awkward dance-offs? We need a live stream!

normalised: Finally, can we talk about Priyanka Chopra’s latest fashion statement? That saree at the Cannes Film Festival was *everything*. Pure elegance! Although, some fashion critics thought the twenty five kilometer train was a bit much. I thought she rocked it! Made me want to order biryani and drape myself in silk!
